plugin.name: twitter-bootstrap
plugin.author: Karol Balejko
plugin.title: Plugin Twitter Bootstrap CSS framework resource files
plugin.description:
Provides Twitter Bootstrap CSS framework resource files.
Bootstrap is Twitter's toolkit for kickstarting CSS for websites, apps, and more. It includes base CSS styles for typography, forms, buttons, tables, grids, navigation, alerts, and more. To get started with Bootstrap checkout the [Bootstrap Documentation|http://getbootstrap.com/getting-started/]!
